about_the_game:
Embark on a chilling and suspense-filled journey into the depths of terror. In this gripping single-player survival horror game, you assume the role of Alisa, an off-duty female NYPD officer, dispatched to unravel the spine-tingling enigma behind a series of eerie deaths haunting the labyrinthine tunnels of the New York City subway system.

Alisa, caught off guard while off-duty, now faces relentless horrors in the subterranean darkness. Armed with only her training and unyielding determination, you must guide her through the perilous underground maze to unearth the sinister secrets that threaten to consume her and the city itself.

Key Features

Survival Horror at Its Best: "Death Rabbit" delivers nail-biting tension and relentless encounters with horrifying enemies. Resources are scarce, and every bullet counts. Can you make it out alive?

Immersive Environments: Explore meticulously detailed subway stations, tunnels, and abandoned areas of the underground, all rendered with stunning graphics and an eerie atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Varied Arsenal: Collect an array of weapons and gear to customize your play-style. From standard police-issue firearms to improvised tools, you must adapt to survive.

Strategic Combat: Face off against grotesque and terrifying enemies that require careful strategy and precise aiming. Ammo conservation and tactical thinking are essential for your survival.

name: Death Rabbit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 Cores or more
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 6 cores or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The city that never sleeps has taken a sinister turn, and the dark tunnels of the MTA have become the epicenter of a horrifying outbreak. As Alisa, you must navigate through a labyrinthine underground world fraught with danger, where unspeakable horrors lurk around every corner.
